Menelgren Power Sword

When the wielder successfully {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} with this power sword, they immediately counterattack with whichever attack costs the least {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. It also grants:
 -<indent=5%>+30% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to parry</indent>-<indent=5%>On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this power sword, the target suffers a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}</indent>
